member.name: T:SheetMetalDXFExporter.SheetMetalScanner
member.summary: Scans the active Inventor doc for sheet-metal parts that can be exported to DXF. Honors suppression and active model states by using AllLeafOccurrences. Avoids opening documents; de-duplicates by FullFileName/InternalName.

member.name: M:SheetMetalDXFExporter.SheetMetalScanner.FindSheetMetalParts
member.summary: Find all sheet metal parts in the current document

member.summary: Scan a single part document for sheet metal definition

member.summary: Scan an assembly using AllLeafOccurrences (no recursion) and avoid opening docs

member.summary: Get summary information about found sheet metal parts

member.name: T:SheetMetalDXFExporter.CenterMarkGenerator
member.summary: Generates center marks (cross lines) from hole center points in DXF files Inventor exports hole centers as POINT entities, this converts them to fabrication-friendly cross marks

member.summary: Generate center marks for a sheet metal part's DXF file This processes the DXF file after export to replace POINT entities with cross marks

member.summary: Extract hole centers by parsing POINT entities from the DXF file
